experience.title: Vice President
experience.description: ENAM Asset Management Company Private Limited (ENAM AMC) is one of India‚Äôs premier choice for long-term wealth creation in Indian Equity Market.At ENAM , the focus has been on pioneering strategies for sustainable wealth creation in the Indian Equity Market for offshore investors.
